trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fournit des données pour l'événement <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> événement est déclenché par l’hôte du concepteur pour certaines actions effectuées sur un contrôle sur l’aire de conception.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> est géré par un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> déléguer la méthode qui prend un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> comme paramètre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe fournit un délégué par défaut pour gérer les <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Concepteurs de contrôles personnalisés substituent les <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, et <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> méthodes pour traiter ces événements pour le contrôle sur l’aire de conception.

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: L’hôte du concepteur initialise un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de l’objet pour le type d’action sur l’aire de conception, puis passe l’objet à le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> déléguer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propriété représente la zone du Concepteur de contrôle auquel l’événement s’applique.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action:
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriété de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objet indique quel type d’action :

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> événement.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> événement.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> événement.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriété fournit les arguments d’événement qui sont spécifiques au type d’action.

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer host initializes <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objects as follows:
trans-unit.target: Par exemple, l’hôte de concepteur initialise <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objets comme suit :

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object when you click a region.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> lorsque vous cliquez sur une région de l’objet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object when a control is drawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> lorsqu’un contrôle est dessiné sur l’aire de conception de l’objet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object when the template editing mode changes for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> lorsque le mode de modification de modèle est modifié pour le contrôle sur l’aire de conception de l’objet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d’informations sur les événements et les délégués, consultez [gestion et déclenchement d’événements](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The type of action that raised the event; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType" />.
trans-unit.target: Type d'action qui a déclenché l'événement ; utilisé pour initialiser <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType" />.

trans-unit.source: The designer region that the action applies to; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: Zone du concepteur à laquelle l'action s'applique ; utilisée pour initialiser <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region" />.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments associated with <c>eventType</c>; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: Arguments d’événement associés à <c>eventType</c> ; utilisés pour initialiser <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> class for the type of view event on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> pour le type d'événement d'affichage dans l'aire de conception.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used by the designer host to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructeur est utilisé par l’hôte de concepteur pour initialiser un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de l’objet pour le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> événement.

trans-unit.source: The designer host passes the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: L’hôte de concepteur passe initialisées <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de l’objet à le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> déléguer.

trans-unit.source: Typically, `region` is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: En règle générale, `region` est définie pour <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> événements, et `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic) pour <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> et <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> les événements.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event arguments that are associated with the action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtient les arguments d'événement qui sont associés à l'action qui a déclenché l'événement.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> that contains additional event data that is specific to the type of event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> qui contient des données d'événement supplémentaires spécifiques au type d'événement.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriété fournit les arguments d’événement qui sont spécifiques au type d’action qui est spécifié dans le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriété.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you click a region, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event, and then initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Par exemple, lorsque vous cliquez sur une région, l’hôte de concepteur initialise le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> comme un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> événement, puis initialise le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriété en tant qu’un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> objet.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event, or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: De même, l’hôte de concepteur initialise le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriété avec un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> de l’objet pour un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> événement, ou un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> pour l’objet un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> événement.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriété est initialisée par le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructeur.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le type d'action qui a déclenché l'événement.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent" /> that specifies the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent" /> qui spécifie le type d'action qui a déclenché l'événement.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action raised the event:
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriété de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objet indique quel type d’action a déclenché l’événement :

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> événement.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> événement.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> événement.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriété fournit les arguments d’événement qui sont spécifiques au type d’action.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriété est initialisée par le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructeur.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la zone du concepteur à laquelle l'événement s'applique.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> auquel l'action s'applique.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propriété représente la zone du Concepteur de contrôle auquel l’événement s’applique.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: En règle générale, les <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propriété est définie pour <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> événements, et `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic) pour <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> et <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> les événements.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propriété est initialisée par le <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructeur.
